text.div:
Military Service Codes

Value Set for Military Service (Example)

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/qicore-military-service defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
not-indicated Not IndicatedThe military status is not indicated
no-military-service No Military ServiceThe subject has no history of military service
veteran VeteranThe subject is has served in the military but is no longer active
active-duty Active DutyThe subject is not a reserve member and is currently engaged in full-time military activity
active-reserve Active ReserveThe subject is a reserve member and is currently engaged in full-time military activity
inactive-reserve Inactive ReserveThe subject is a reserve member and is not currently engaged in full-time military activity

name: Military Service Codes
publisher: HL7 Clinical Quality Information (CQI) Work Group

concept.definition: The military status is not indicated
The subject has no history of military service
The subject is has served in the military but is no longer active
The subject is not a reserve member and is currently engaged in full-time military activity
The subject is a reserve member and is currently engaged in full-time military activity
The subject is a reserve member and is not currently engaged in full-time military activity
